name: Wireless Earbuds
description: Experience high-quality sound with these compact wireless earbuds, designed for all-day comfort and crystal-clear calls.

name: Smartphone Stand
description: Keep your phone upright and hands-free with this durable, adjustable stand—perfect for video calls and content viewing.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Powerful and portable Bluetooth speaker with rich bass, perfect for both indoor gatherings and outdoor adventures.

name: USB-C Cable
description: Fast-charging and durable USB-C cable with reinforced ends—ideal for daily use with phones, tablets, and laptops.

name: LED Desk Lamp
description: Stylish LED desk lamp with touch control and adjustable brightness—great for reading, working, or relaxing.

name: Gaming Mouse
description: Ergonomic gaming mouse with customizable RGB lighting and high DPI for fast-paced gaming sessions.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: A responsive mechanical keyboard with tactile switches and vibrant RGB lighting to elevate your typing and gaming experience.

name: Wireless Phone Charger
description: Enjoy clutter-free charging with this sleek and efficient wireless charger—compatible with all Qi-enabled devices.

name: Mini Projector
description: Compact yet powerful projector perfect for home theaters, presentations, or movie nights on the go.

name: USB-C Hub
description: Expand your laptop’s capabilities with this multi-port USB-C hub that supports HDMI, USB 3.0, and card readers.

name: Noise Cancelling Headphones
description: Immerse yourself in music with advanced noise cancellation and soft ear cushions for all-day listening comfort.

name: Fitness Tracker Band
description: Monitor your health and activity with this smart band that tracks steps, heart rate, sleep patterns, and more.

name: Foldable Laptop Stand
description: Lightweight and foldable laptop stand with adjustable height to improve posture and reduce neck strain.

name: LED Desk Lamp
description: Compact LED lamp with adjustable brightness and color temperature to suit reading, working, or relaxing moods.

name: Wireless Gaming Controller
description: Versatile wireless controller with dual-mode connectivity, responsive triggers, and long battery life for console-style gaming.
